description: Update Deere equipment metadata or assignment.
permissions: Admins can update any Deere equipment. Non-admin users can update Deere equipment only when they are members of the record's broker organization.
side_effects: Updates the Deere equipment record; when --equipment is provided as an empty string, the equipment relationship is cleared.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one field must be provided to update; if no updatable flags are set, the command errors and instructs to specify --equipment. Use an empty string for --equipment to clear the equipment assignment.

flags.name: --equipment
flags.validation: Use an empty string to clear the equipment assignment.
